summary: The module implements functionality for consolidating duplicate edition and work entries in the Open Library catalog. It offers a Flask-based endpoint to receive merge requests, assembles the combined edition data, and carries out the merge operation. Supporting utilities handle work-level merges, including extraction of publication years and normalization of work identifiers to ensure consistent, conflictâ€‘free records.
business_intent: Eliminate redundant catalog entries, preserve data consistency, and improve the quality and usability of the Open Library's bibliographic data by providing reliable mechanisms for merging duplicate editions and works.
